name: BackToLife
description:
You don't want to leave this life yet!

Your soul doesn't want to let go of your body so you are in a hurry to win it back. There is only one thing you are scared of, the light! Don't go towards the light.

Controls

Move up and down with corresponding up and down Arrow keys.

Use left-click to hit 'Restart'

Features
  • Side scrolling mainly pixel 2D game for PC
  • 1 level
  • Health UI with pixel hearts
  • Restart button

This is a student project for INFSCI1061 at the University of Pittsburgh.

I hope you will enjoy it! -Armin
